name: Hybrid Liquid Eyeliner
about: What it is:A clear, fast-drying magnetic-adhesive hybrid liner that provides a long-lasting, powerful grip on Glamnetic Magnetic Lashes..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Glamnetic's breakthrough magnetic-adhesive hybrid liner holds lashes securely in place all day and night. Mess-free and easy-to-apply, this invisible, fast-drying latex-free formula has an ultrafine brush that effortlessly glides with precision along the lash line for a natural, barely-there look.
ingredients: Water (Aqua/Eau), Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Biotin, Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (Cl77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Make sure natural lashes are clean and dry..-Starting from the inner corner of your eye working outwards, glide Hybrid Liquid Magnetic Eyeliner along your upper lash line. .-For optimal magnetic connection, make sure your Magnetic Eyeliner is as thick as the width of the magnets and that there are no visible gaps..-Wait 30 seconds, allowing your Magnetic Eyeliner to dry almost completely..-Using your fingers, gently place your Glamnetic Magnetic Lashes (sold separately) on to your Magnetic Eyeliner, allowing the magnets to connect and gently tug to ensure the grip is secure. .-Adjust lash placement as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this product, zero stars I would. There was no hold. It irritated my eyelids. it was sticky when it dried. The only positive I could possibly say is that it does go on with a film with a white-ish tint but dries clear. Hopefully it works for you, but it did not work for me at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if I got a bad batch or what but my magnetic lashes will not stay on with this glue. they work fine with the regular stuff, just not the clear. disappointed.
